TeamMentor page for: Unchecked Error Condition

Content for CWE ID: 391

Checkmarx Rule

QueryId : 1351
Cwe : 391
IsExecutable : true
IsEncrypted : false
Severity : 0
PackageId : 1277
Status : Original
Type : Regular

Source

 CxList AllExc = All.FindByType(typeof(Catch));

CxList notGenExc = 	All.FindAllReferences(AllExc) - 
					All.FindByName("Exception", false).GetFathers();

CxList genExc = AllExc - notGenExc;

result = AllExc.GetFathers()  - (AllExc.GetFathers() * genExc.GetFathers());
